description: Comprehensive Web Vitals Dashboard - Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, INP) + Additional Metrics (FCP, TTFB) with detailed breakdowns

panels.title: 📊 Core Web Vitals Overview (Google's Key Metrics)
LCP (p75)
panels.description:
Largest Contentful Paint - Measures loading performance

Good: <2.5s | Needs Improvement: 2.5-4s | Poor: >4s

panels.title: INP (p75)
panels.description:
Interaction to Next Paint - Measures interactivity

Good: <200ms | Needs Improvement: 200-500ms | Poor: >500ms

panels.title: CLS (p75)
panels.description:
Cumulative Layout Shift - Measures visual stability

Good: <0.1 | Needs Improvement: 0.1-0.25 | Poor: >0.25

panels.title: FCP (p75)
panels.description:
First Contentful Paint - First visual feedback

Good: <1.8s | Needs Improvement: 1.8-3s | Poor: >3s

panels.title: TTFB (p75)
panels.description:
Time to First Byte - Server response time

Good: <800ms | Needs Improvement: 800-1800ms | Poor: >1800ms

panels.title: 📈 Samples/min
panels.description: Number of web vitals samples received per minute

panels.title: LCP Score (% Good)
panels.description:
Percentage of page loads with LCP < 2.5s

Target: >75% for good user experience

panels.title: INP Score (% Good)
panels.description:
Percentage of interactions with INP < 200ms

Target: >75% for good user experience

panels.title: CLS Score (% Good)
panels.description:
Percentage of page loads with CLS < 0.1

Target: >75% for good user experience

panels.title: LCP Distribution
panels.description: Distribution of LCP scores across all page loads

panels.title: LCP Percentiles Over Time
panels.description: Track LCP trends across different percentiles. Focus on p75 as Google recommends.

panels.title: LCP Score Distribution
panels.description: Percentage of users experiencing Good/Needs Improvement/Poor LCP

panels.title: LCP by Route (p75)
panels.description: Compare LCP performance across different pages/routes

panels.title: INP Percentiles Over Time
panels.description: Interaction to Next Paint measures responsiveness. Lower is better.

panels.title: INP Score Distribution
panels.description: Percentage of interactions with Good/Needs Improvement/Poor INP

panels.title: INP by Route (p75)
panels.description: Compare INP performance across different pages/routes

panels.title: CLS Percentiles Over Time
panels.description: Cumulative Layout Shift measures visual stability. Lower is better.

panels.title: CLS Score Distribution
panels.description: Percentage of page loads with Good/Needs Improvement/Poor CLS

panels.title: CLS by Route (p75)
panels.description: Compare CLS performance across different pages/routes

panels.title: 🏁 FCP & TTFB - First Contentful Paint & Time to First Byte
FCP - First Contentful Paint
panels.description: Time until first text/image is rendered. Good: <1.8s, Poor: >3s

panels.title: TTFB - Time to First Byte
panels.description: Server response time. Good: <800ms, Poor: >1800ms

panels.title: FCP by Route (p75)
panels.description: Compare FCP across different pages

panels.title: TTFB by Route (p75)
panels.description: Compare server response time across different pages

title: Web Vitals - Enhanced
